title: Subtitle Splitter
description: This recipe guides you through extracting subtitles from a video file using Subtitle Edit.

statement: Drag your video file onto the main screen of 'Subtitle Edit'. It will automatically extract the audio and generate a waveform.
After the waveform is generated, go to 'Video' -> 'Import subtitle from video'.
A 'VobSub' window will appear. Click 'Start ripping'.
When finished, save the newly created subtitle file (.srt) in this directory. Now, please enter the full name of the .srt file you just saved (e.g., 'my_movie.srt').
